title: New: GEO – Better (Feat. Gabriela Francesca & Rex Mac)
content:
Was super into the first couple of tracks from LA’s GEO, slick productions that hinted at a solid knowledge of pop songstructures.

Hence my excitement at seeing his latest track featured other vocalists for the first time; singer Gabriela Francesca and rapper Rex Mac. Managing to keep his unique production style at the core of the track, Better is another vibrant, accessible number, that hints at GEO really beginning to carve out a niche for himself. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
